name: Ober Mountain
description: High above the acclaimed resort town of Gatlinburg TN, bordering the Great Smoky Mountains National Park, Ober Mountain is more than a winter ski area and snow tubing park. A 120 passenger Aerial Tramway takes visitors over 2 miles from downtown up to the base of our slopes and a year-round mountaintop amusement park, with indoor ice skating, shopping, dining, mountain coaster, Alpine Slide, wildlife encounter and much more
